alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area; Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Air Stagnation Advisory issued December 16 at 11:46AM PST until December 18 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...AIR STAGNATION ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Stagnant conditions will have potential to trap pollutants near the ground with deteriorated air quality. * WHERE...Sherman Pass, Pangborn Airport, Nespelem, Disautel Pass, Number 1 Canyon, Wenatchee, Chesaw Road, Conconully, Twisp, Oroville, Brewster, Mazama, Cashmere, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Mansfield, Holden Village, Entiat, Loup Loup Pass, Republic, Omak, Badger Mountain Road, Leavenworth, Methow, Okanogan, Stevens Pass, Inchelium, Winthrop, Chelan, Stehekin, Plain, Boulder Creek Road, Wauconda, Number 2 Canyon, Bridgeport, Tonasket, and Waterville. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Periods of air stagnation can lead to the buildup of pollutants near the surface.
info.instruction: Buildup of fine pollution particles can be harmful to those sensitive to air pollution including people with lung and heart problems, people with diabetes, children and the elderly.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area; Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County
